attributes.action: Make UK Period Product Makers List Ingredients on Product Packaging
attributes.additional_details:
Here I've linked:
My story as a period and climate activist: https://www.itv.com/news/wales/2019-08-15/cardiff-pupil-s-campaign-to-highlight-level-of-plastic-in-period-products/
The affects of plastic period products on the economy, environment and our health: https://www.citytosea.org.uk/plasticfreeperiods-2/
How New York passed this in 2019: https://msmagazine.com/2019/07/05/new-york-just-made-menstrual-history/
attributes.background: Due to there being no legal obligation for ingredients to be listed, we aren't aware of what's in these products. They're 90% plastic (stats linked) causing environmental issues and possibly health issues as we're absorbing this plastic into us. We have a right to easily know what's in our products.
